Name: COMPLETE_HOME_SCAN.py
What It Actually Does: Scans entire home directory for audio files using find command, merges with existing CSV catalogs to create unified catalog
Key Functions: find_all_audio_files() - subprocess find for .mp3/.wav/.m4a/.flac, merge with CSV catalogs

Name: CONTENT_AWARE_ANALYZER.py
What It Actually Does: Deep reads actual audio file content using ffprobe - extracts metadata, fingerprints, quality metrics from file headers/streams (NOT filename guessing)
Key Functions: read_audio_content() - ffprobe JSON extraction, content fingerprinting

Name: INTELLIGENT_MERGE.py
What It Actually Does: Merges ALL previous scan/analysis data from multiple CSV sources, handles conflicts, deduplicates, creates master catalog
Key Functions: merge_all_existing_data() - loads multiple CSVs, conflict resolution, deduplication

Name: CONSOLIDATE_ALL.py
What It Actually Does: Moves scattered files to organized locations based on type/purpose, creates destination dirs, preserves structure
Key Functions: consolidate_files() - destination mapping, dry-run mode, backup creation

Name: PROPER_CONTENT_SEPARATION.py
What It Actually Does: Uses ffprobe to read actual file content (not extension), separates music/podcasts/audiobooks based on real audio analysis
Key Functions: analyze_audio_file() - deep ffprobe analysis, content-aware classification

Name: MYSTERY_FILES_CHECKER.py
What It Actually Does: Identifies unknown files by reading actual metadata using ffprobe - shows what files really contain when filename doesn't match
Key Functions: check_file() - ffprobe metadata extraction, format identification

Name: aspect_ratio_analyzer.py
What It Actually Does: Analyzes all images in ~/Pictures, calculates aspect ratios, categorizes by ratio type, outputs CSV for filtering
Key Functions: get_aspect_ratio() - PIL dimension reading, ratio classification, CSV output

Name: master_control.py
What It Actually Does: Central CLI for ALL file management - scanning, organizing, deduplicating, analyzing. Unified interface using FileAnalyzer + SmartOrganizer
Key Functions: scan(), stats(), duplicates(), remove-duplicates(), organize(), analyze(), related(), export()

Name: master_orchestrator.py
What It Actually Does: MASTER controller using ALL API keys from ~/.env.d/, coordinates all tools, complete intelligent music management. Loads 273 API keys, routes to services
Key Functions: load_api_keys(), check_available_services(), identify_smart_actions() - transcription/music/voice/analysis services

Name: smart_organizer.py
What It Actually Does: Intelligent file organizer with ML-based classification + rule engine. Uses FileAnalyzer to understand files, applies priority-based rules
Key Functions: determine_target(), generate_organization_plan(), execute_plan() - 8 organization rules (audio by artist/album, code by language, images by year, etc)

Name: file_intelligence.py
What It Actually Does: Advanced file analysis with SQLite database. Creates comprehensive fingerprints: hashes, MIME types, metadata, language detection, relationships
Key Functions: analyze_file(), scan_directory(), _extract_metadata() - MD5/SHA256 hashing, ffprobe/PIL/PyPDF2 metadata, duplicate detection
Dependencies: hashlib, sqlite3, mimetypes, subprocess, PIL, PyPDF2

Name: content_classifier.py
What It Actually Does: Classifies audio/video by TYPE and PURPOSE using duration + keyword analysis. Distinguishes music/gaming/podcasts/tutorials/stories/spiritual/short clips
Key Functions: analyze_file(), _classify() - ffprobe duration extraction, keyword matching, content type scoring

Name: ultimate_music_intelligence.py
What It Actually Does: Complete music management system - checks available AI services, identifies smart actions (transcription, metadata, bundles), provides status summary
Key Functions: load_catalog(), check_available_services(), identify_smart_actions() - 12+ AI service checking, action identification

Name: audio_transcriber.py
What It Actually Does: Deep audio transcription with SQLite caching. Transcribes, compares against other files/text files, finds duplicates/variations, builds similarity database
Key Functions: get_transcription(), save_transcription(), find_similar() - Whisper/cloud services, similarity matching, confidence scoring

Name: deep_content_aware_analysis.py
What It Actually Does: Analyzes all JSON metadata from Suno, matches with actual audio files. Handles multiple JSON schemas, extracts song info, creates unified catalog
Key Functions: load_all_json_metadata(), extract_song_info(), find_all_audio_files(), match_metadata_to_files() - recursive JSON loading, fuzzy matching
Dependencies: json, csv, pathlib, subprocess, difflib, collections

Name: config_manager.py
What It Actually Does: Loads API keys and settings from ~/.env.d/ directory. Parses .env files, stores API keys separately, provides get_api_key() interface
Key Functions: _load_config(), _load_env_file(), get_api_key() - .env file parsing, JSON config loading

Name: multi-llm-orchestrator.py
What It Actually Does: Intelligent router selecting BEST AI model per task based on type/quality/speed/cost. Implements multi-model consensus for critical decisions. 12+ AI models configured
Key Functions: select_best_model(), query_model(), multi_model_consensus() - OpenAI/Claude/Grok/Groq/Gemini/Cohere/DeepSeek routing
Dependencies: anthropic, openai, groq, google.generativeai, cohere, asyncio

Name: content-orchestrator.py
What It Actually Does: Unified content orchestration integrating Make.com blueprints, Python scripts, TypeScript awareness, multi-AI. Converts Make.com workflows to Python code
Key Functions: parse_makecom_blueprint(), makecom_to_python(), deep_content_analysis(), generate_youtube_content() - Make.com parsing, semantic embeddings, YouTube pipeline
Dependencies: anthropic, openai, groq, asyncio, json, pathlib

Name: automation-discovery-engine.py
What It Actually Does: Uses ALL 12 AI APIs to discover automation opportunities. Analyzes 562,868 files, identifies repetitive tasks, integration opportunities, workflow combinations
Key Functions: discover_content_pipelines(), prioritize_opportunities(), generate_implementation_plan() - 8 major opportunities found, ROI calculation

Name: intelligent-workflow-builder.py
What It Actually Does: Analyzes 748+ Python scripts using AST parsing, creates optimized AI-powered workflows, maps dependencies, calculates ROI/time savings
Key Functions: analyze_codebase(), _scan_directory(), _load_from_csv() - AST parsing, dependency mapping, workflow generation
Dependencies: ast, json, csv, anthropic, openai, pathlib, collections

Name: deep-folder-analyzer.py
What It Actually Does: Comprehensive directory analysis - structure, file types, sizes, patterns, depth distribution, largest files/dirs, empty dirs, symlinks, detailed reports
Key Functions: analyze(), calculate_dir_size(), print_report(), save_json_report() - recursive scanning, size calculation, statistics generation
Dependencies: os, json, pathlib, collections, mimetypes, datetime

Name: organize.py
What It Actually Does: CSV-driven file copy utility. Reads CSV with Original Path column, copies files to destination while preserving directory structure
Key Functions: copy_files_with_structure() - CSV reading, directory creation, file copying

Name: audio.py
What It Actually Does: Audio file metadata extractor. Scans directories for audio files, extracts ID3 tags using Mutagen, generates CSV with filename/duration/size/date/path
Key Functions: generate_dry_run_csv(), get_audio_metadata() - Mutagen ID3 reading, duration formatting, exclusion patterns
Dependencies: mutagen (EasyID3, MP3), csv, os, re, datetime

Name: img.py
What It Actually Does: Image file metadata extractor. Scans directories for images, extracts metadata using PIL, generates CSV with filename/size/date/width/height/DPI/path
Key Functions: generate_csv(), get_image_metadata() - PIL image analysis, DPI extraction, dimension reading

Name: analyzer.py
What It Actually Does: Core AST + semantic analysis pipeline. Uses AST parsing, libcst, astroid, sentence transformers for intelligent file insights - embeddings, semantic tags, architectural roles
Key Functions: analyze_file(), _summarize_ast(), _tag_semantics(), _detect_architecture(), _get_embedding() - AST analysis, semantic tagging, embedding generation with caching
Dependencies: ast, libcst, astroid, sentence_transformers, networkx, sqlite3
